item.title: Do you know Java: Hidden Keywords
item.description: Java has a lot of keywords which are not used as identifiers or values. Though, Java has a lot of keywords, some of them are less known or even not used. More over not used because they cannot be used at all. The good old goto is one of the two. Since sequence, selection and iteration are enough for Turing machine, goto became unnecessarily, not to mention that understanding the code becomes hard to follow.
